title: What happened to lore patch notes?
body: Those were a thing for a bit, and they were quite helpful in keeping up with the story. But I can't recall seeing one in ages.

replies.body: The lore patch notes were done by Bret Forbus (RiotAshekandi) and he has pledged that they will return very soon.

That's good to know, I almost missed the update to Leonas and Dianas bios due to them not being mentioned anywhere(and universe didn't put them into the "featured category" at the top of the page either).
It's been on hiatus for the holidays but was guaranteed to make a return. Not sure when but I'd assume with the new Season premiere.
I hope this will return, not everybody checks updates on Universe site {{champion:31}}
I get all my lore updates from Necrit, on youtube. You should check him out; he is quite a storyteller {{item:3165}}
